document.full_text: japan's canon inc  reported a 5 percent fall in quarterly operating profit and slashed its annual outlook to below market expectations as it tries to deal with a quake-hit supply chain that it said was months away from being fixed.
document.title: canon cuts profit outlook, parts recovery still months away
lines_and_colors: japan's canon inc  reported a 5 percent fall in quarterly operating profit and slashed its annual outlook to below market expectations as it tries to deal with a quake-hit supply chain that it said was months away from being fixed.
